cast.overview: Found inside a shining stalk of bamboo by an old bamboo cutter and his wife, a tiny girl grows rapidly into an exquisite young lady. The mysterious young princess enthrals all who encounter her. But, ultimately, she must confront her fate.
cast.title: The Tale of The Princess Kaguya

crew.overview: Upon being sent to live with relatives in the countryside due to an illness, an emotionally distant adolescent girl becomes obsessed with an abandoned mansion and infatuated with a girl who lives there - a girl who may or may not be real.
crew.title: When Marnie Was There

crew.original_title: 君たちはどう生きるか
crew.overview: While the Second World War rages, the teenage Mahito, haunted by his mother's tragic death, is relocated from Tokyo to the serene rural home of his new stepmother Natsuko, a woman who bears a striking resemblance to the boy's mother. As he tries to adjust, this strange new world grows even stranger following the appearance of a persistent gray heron, who perplexes and bedevils Mahito, dubbing him the "long-awaited one."
crew.title: The Boy and the Heron

details.biography:
Tamaki Kojo (古城 環) is a photographer and production manager working for Studio Ghibli.

He was selected by Director Takahata, who had a hard time selecting people, to voice the character of Middle Counselor Isonokami in The Tale of the Princess Kaguya.
details.name: Tamaki Kojo
